description: Wrap up dinner with these deliciously simple beef burritos that the whole family will love.
keywords: Beef wrap,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Beef,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Easy Bulgogi Beef Wraps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large frying pan or wok over high heat. Remove meat from the packaging and loosen. Add meat to the pan and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring frequently, until charred and cooked through.
Remove freshness sachet from wrap packet and microwave for 45 seconds.
Toss coleslaw together with dressing in a large bowl.
Serve beef on wraps with sliced avocado and slaw.
